name: Create & Live A Life You Love
description:
Create and Live a Life You Love: A guide to the game of life and how to play it

Are you happy with your life?

At one time or another, every one of us has gone through a dark time as we struggle with our relationships, sense of purpose, finances, or health. It’s part of being human. This guide shares some of the best secrets, strategies, and tips that Kerry , the founder of Blossom Body & Soul, a qualified homeopath and holistic counsellor with a successful practice in Perth, Australia, has successfully used and has shared with her clients. These insights can help you to create a life you can truly love.

Do you realise that you control your destiny? Do you understand that you can create a life you love? Do you know that you can make your dreams come true?

By using the keys contained within and adopting these simple practices, you can immediately begin to create and live a life you love. Incorporate these healthy and loving new strategies, and you may soon begin to see a new life emerge.

Welcome to your new world!

name: Inner Peace Remedy
description:
Inner Peace
Infusion of Crystal & Flower Essence’s in an Oral Spray

There is much change and unrest happening at the moment, both personally and globally.
For some this causes stress, worry, anxiousness, a sense of overwhelm and a feeling of being lost– which can eventually lead to ill health unless treated.

Inner peace is a wonderful, effective combination of flower and crystal essences that help ease physical, emotional and spiritual trauma and helps to restore hope, calm and balance. 
 Inner Peace helps release stagnation in the meridian system and also aligns the heart and the mind, it helps to lift your spirits, soothe your mind and settle your body. It encourages emotional balance and helps you to find your way again.

To Use:
•	Carry this handy spray and spray directly into your mouth, any time you need a reminder to feel calm and release stress and worries.
•	If you experience extreme, chronic worry and stress, you may want to add 3 sprays to a glass/bottle of water and drink throughout the day.
•	As a daily tonic it is great to use once in the morning as a spray under your tongue before your day begins.

name: UPLIFT CLEARING SPRAY
description:
CLEARING SPRAY

The feeling of our surroundings affects us on so many levels, so  using our Clearing Spray will release stagnant and negative energy, it will uplift your mood, and assist to create a sacred and harmonious environment.  In turn, this will refill our space with a vibrant energy field, leaving us open to loving and healing energies as a result. 


CLEARING OURSELVES AND OUR SPACE

As the world and environment we live in has become more hectic, polluted and stress-filled, it becomes more important to cleanse ourselves, our energy fields and the personal spaces we inhabit such as our homes and places of work. This is so important for our health and wellbeing, both physically, emotionally and spiritually. 

Our Clearing and Uplift Mist contains an amazingly powerful blend of essences and nurturing essential oils that will:

	Uplift our mood
	Clear negative energies
	Ground us 
	Infuse our space with uplifting and enhancing energies

The ingredients we use are of the highest quality and efficacy and are sourced from  natural, sustainable, organic or wild crafted sources. 

Ingredients:

	Orange Blossom floral water
	Homeopathic and Crystal Essences

The Crystal Essences we use are:

	Amethyst Crystal Essence - This essence assists with purification of the physical body and the energy body, which are our chakras and aura. It will strengthen and cleanse the immune system and will assist to bring about a peaceful and harmonious state. 
	Frankincense Crystal Essence - This essence will help you to relax and to release any stress residing in your physical and mental body. It will assist to bring about a state of great peace and a deep sense of calmness. 
	Peridot Crystal Essence - This  essence is a great cleanser and purifier and will calm a troubled spirit. 
	Obsidian Crystal Essence - This essence has amazing cleansing and grounding properties and will assist to release negative fears and anxieties. 
	Oak Crystal Essence - This essence is extremely grounding and will assist to furnish our spirit with strength and endurance.
	Rose Quartz - This is reassuring and offers a soothing and quietening of the mind, body and soul.


The Essential Oils we use are:

	Lemongrass
	Lemon Myrtle
	Lime
	Peppermint
	Eucalyptus

name: Bath Salts
description:
BATH SALTS

Our salts can be added to the bath or used as a skin exfoliate.

WHAT MAKES OUR BATH SALTS SO AMAZING AND SPEACIAL?
unlike normal bath salts which just include salts, our bath salts are a unique, amazing combination of Himalayan salts, Epsom salts and Crystal essences that encourage the mind, body and soul to relax and purify. Bathing is a wonderful way to nurture the mind body and soul. 
Enjoy a soothing bath with Blossom’s natural mineral bath salts which are a special blend of an all-natural range of unscented, additive-free bath salts in a fine form so that they can be easily and quickly dissolved in your bath or foot bath or used as a skin exfoliate. 
Mineral rich Bath Salts are a time honoured treatment to relieve muscular discomfort, detoxify your skin and bring health and balance to your body.

BENEFITS 
•	Amethyst crystal essence – assists with purification of the physical body and the energy body – the chakras and aura. Strengthens and cleanses the immune system and brings peace and harmony. 
•	Frankincense crystal essence – helps you to relax and release stress. Helps create a state within of calmness and great peace, brings deep peace and harmony 
•	Peridot crystal essence – a great cleanser and purifier calms the troubled spirit. 
•	Obsidian crystal essence - great cleansing and grounding properties, releases fear and anxiety 
•	Oak crystal essence – grounding and helps give strength and endurance.

•	Magnesium sulphate, the main ingredient in Epsom salt, is easily absorbed into the skin and works as a natural detoxifier, drawing impurities from the skin. It is also a muscle relaxant and reduces tension all over the body – naturally. 
•	Himalayan salt softens the skin and contains upwards of 84 minerals that our bodies need and that detoxify and deeply cleanse the pores.
USES FOR OUR BATH SALTS
As bath salts: A good soak in a tub filled with warm water and mixed with two cups of our bath salts is great for detoxifying the body and relieving stress.
As a foot soak: The feet are often the most abused parts of our bodies, and it is not surprising when we feel pain in our feet. Soaking the feet in warm water mixed with half a cup of our salts can take the pain away from the feet. Doing so also helps reduce the appearance of varicose veins and helps treat athlete’s foot and other fungal ailments commonly afflicting the feet.
As a facial scrub:our salts are fine, so can be used as an effective agent in cleaning and exfoliating the face. Exfoliating the face is
necessary because it sloughs away the layers of dead skin cells from the face and allows newer, healthier cells to emerge. This is easy to do; all that needs to be done is to mix a pinch of bath salt with the facial scrub and massage it onto the face. Afterwards, rinse it off.
As a body scrub: Just like the skin on the face, the skin on the body also needs to be exfoliated. But other than that, massaging our salts all over the body can also promote better blood circulation, soften the rough parts and help in making the skin tone look more even. Just rub our salts on your skin and rinse.

These are just some of the uses bath salts has that can help promote bodily health.
Having some bath salts at home is always handy.

Our baths salts come in a beautiful tall glass apothecary jar to display your salts fitting into any décor. Filled with 670g of bath salts for maximum luxury in bathrooms. Refill bags are also available.
glass jar = @ 25.5 cm high
spoon =  @ 9.5 cm long

name: Herbal Tea Starter pack
description:
Herbal Tea starter Pack
This is a great way to try, enjoy and use a variety of our herbal teas. Included is also a tea infuser so all you have to do is boil the kettle and enjoy.
Included is:
1 x 30g -Energy herbal tea
1 x 30g - Inner Goddess herbal tea
1 x 30g – Uplift herbal tea
1 x 15g – Calm herbal tea
1 x tea infuser 

Energy herbal tea
Battery running flat? Recharge with this ginseng tonic. A blend supercharged with energising herbs renowned to help improve your energy levels, mental function and concentration. Enhances energy production and acts as a supportive adrenal stimulant which helps you cope better with stress. 
Has a tangy ginseng taste.
We recommend against taking anything containing ginseng if you have any heart condition or if you are pregnant.
Contains: Panax ginseng, Siberian ginseng, rosehip, liquorice, and hibiscus. 
These herbs are thought to assist with counteracting stress and improve physical and mental energy.
Inner Goddess herbal tea
This is a beautiful tea to balance the female hormonal system and embrace your inner woman. 
Contains:  red clover, wild yam, sage, chaste berry tree and black cohosh. 
These herbs are thought to assist in reducing some of the symptoms associated with menopause such as hot flushes, night sweats, dryness and headaches, PMS and balancing the female hormonal system.
Uplift herbal tea
Need to uplift your spirits, feel energized, and improve your focus and motivation? 
Then Uplift is the perfect tea for you, specially blended by myself to taste beautiful as well as having fantastic herbal benefits. 
If you don’t normally like the taste of herbal teas, Uplift will surprise you, a beautiful citrus tasting tea packed full of goodness.

Awaken the senses with this invigorating and refreshing caffeine free blend of herbs, whilst gently helping to detoxify the body as well.
The kids will also love this one. A great alternative to unhealthy cordials and soft drinks etc.
Contains: 
•	Lemongrass - has a positive effect on nervous conditions and provides a gentle boost when exhausted. And – it tastes great! 
•	Hibiscus -great for fatigue, sore throat, cold, flu. As it is rich in Vitamin C 
•	Turkish Apple pieces & Orange - full of vitamins 
•	Lemon myrtle- is known for its calming and uplifting properties 
•	Dandelion root - used to detox & purify the liver and gallbladder of toxins. Rich in vitamins A, C, D, and B-complex with high levels of minerals 
•	Lemon and Lime essence (natural flavour)
 Calm herbal tea
Calming the Mind, Body & Soul, a soothing blend offering an overall calming action that helps relax and restore the whole body. 
Eases your restlessness and helps to bring your whole body back into balance, so you can feel serene and take life as it comes. 
An ideal compliment in life as it helps in managing day to day stresses we all live with. 
Can be used anytime of the day.
Contains:  chamomile, hibiscus flower, lavender and passion flower all are well known for their calming, relaxing qualities. These herbs are thought to assist with calming, relaxation, soothing the nerves, restlessness, insomnia and anxiety.
Tea Infuser
A fantastic, easy and portable way to use herbal teas. This special design cup holder tea infuser features a special hook to hang on the side of your cup or mug. Just place your herbal tea into the mesh and place in your cup then add hot water covering the herbs. 
Dimensions: 
65mm top diameter, 55mm deep, 105mm long including handle.

name: Aromatherapy Car Scenter
description:
Motor vehicle travel has a huge impact on everyone's lifestyle.  
The Aromatherapy Car Scenter offers a safe and convenient way to enjoy the delightful pleasures and benefits of pure essential oils while you drive. To ensure stress free driving, surround yourself with the aromatic aromas of pure essential oils which can soothe your anxiety, refresh your mind and promote general wellbeing.
The Car Scenter is sold with Uplift essential oil and five reusable oil pads. Replacement packs of 10 pads maybe purchased separately.
Uplift essential oil is an amazing blend of essential oils to help uplift your mood, reduce stress and keep you focused and alert. 
Contains: 
•	Lime - refreshing and uplifting. The crisp citrus tones will bring a smile to your face and joy to your heart. 
•	Sweet orange - lifts the spirits and eases the mind. 
•	Lemon scented tea tree - emotionally it is said to be useful for reducing anxiety, stress, and depression and for easing nervous tension.
The car scenter:
•	does not over heat
•	is easy to use
•	eliminates spillage
•	is safe to touch

name: Meditation Soy Candle
description:
Using the wisdom of nature and the art of aromatherapy, we have created a range of therapeutic candles to help combat the stress and issues of modern day living.
A beautiful natural soy wax candle in a frosted glass container. 
Our meditation candle is a unique blend of ancient spiritual 100% essential oils to help aid you with meditation and reaching that quite spot. Helps slow the breath and reduce mind chatter.
Ingredients:
. myrrh - helps balance the energy system and stimulates the crown chakra and has been used for thousands of years regards spirituality
. frankincense offers protection, purification and uplifts.Promotes receptivity and spirituality.Known to aid in meditation
. cedar wood atlas - protection, healing and purification also calming
. lavender - stimulates the third eye chakra is very calming and balancing helps with inner peace , purification and protection
. lemon - a very calming oil that helps with mental powers, clarity, purification and love
. rosemary - protection, mental powers, purification and uplifting


Burn time = 40 - 50 hours

At Blossom Body & Soul we make all of our candles from all natural soy wax which is a renewable source, biodegradable and contains no pesticides or herbicides. Our wax is blended with exquisite natural essential oils and our wicks are 100% cotton and contain no lead. Soy wax candles are non toxic, burn cleaner and longer than paraffin wax candles.

Blossom uses the finest natural ingredients and premium natural essential oils. 
All Blossom candles are meticulously hand-made and hand-poured locally in Australia. 
The candle comes with an easy to remove label so you can enjoy the beautiful frosted glass container.perfect for any home decor.

name: teapot warmer
description:
Teapot warmer with candle 
Each warmer comes with 1 candle inside the large glass bowl, and a metal plate to support the glass teapot. A great way to keep our herbal infusions warm.

This warmer has a large enough surface area to hold any of our glass teapots.


Diameter: 124mm, depth: 70mm.

name: Oil Burner
description:
Our oil burner is white with a gloss finish, very classy, elegant -suiting any decor. It has a unique deep dish to enable you to burn oils for longer.

Dimentions:
Height 120 x 125 W x 104 dish 
Dish depth 25mm

name: Energy Herbal Tea Infusion Refill
description:
ENERGY HERBAL TEA

THE RED BULL OF HERBAL TEA
This particular Energy Herbal Tea has been designed by Kerry especially for those of us whose batteries are running on the lower side! Recharge naturally with this supercharged ginseng tonic which has energising herbs known to help improve energy levels, concentration and overall mental function.  This tea has a great tangy taste and will also act as a supportive adrenal stimulant which has been proven to assist with the management of stress.  This beautiful blend has been designed to draw on Mother Nature’s wisdom of the ages. 

Ginseng is known as the ‘Root of Life’ and has been used for around 7000 years!
It is best known as a vitality and stamina boosting herb and is a stimulating tonic. Ginseng has a positive effect on the central nervous, cardiovascular and endocrine systems, and also promotes immune function and serves to boost metabolism. 

Ingredients:

	Panax Ginseng - A Qi tonic that is brilliant at counteracting stress and improving physical energy and strength.
	Siberian Ginseng - This reduces the adrenaline and cortical rush caused by stressful events and returns them to baseline more quickly, thus reducing the effects on blood pressure, nerves etc. It basically assists the body to adapt to stress. Siberian Ginseng is also noted for its ability to aid mental function and concentration.
	Rosehip - Rosehip is a natural source of Vitamin C and bioflavonoid. It is a liver, kidney and blood tonic, and a fantastic remedy for fatigue and colds etc. It is of garnet colour and a lively and fruity infusion to the tea. Our combination of rosehips and hibiscus provides essential Vitamin C and antioxidants to help prevent tiredness and to relieve a sluggish and overworked immune system.
	Liquorice - is a perfect partner with ginsengs as in Chinese medicine, it is also classified as a Qi tonic. This means it is used to restore our basic energy levels and help us adapt to the stressors life places on us. Liquorice is also a strong adrenal support. 
	Hibiscus - This is great for fighting fatigue and those sore throats, colds and flu bugs as it’s super rich in Vitamin C. 

The herbs that have been used are especially designed to counteract stress and how it affects our mental and physical energy. 

NOTE - WE RECOMMEND AGAINST THE CONSUMPTION OF GINSENG IF YOU HAVE ANY HEART OR KIDNEY CONDITION OR IF YOU ARE PREGNANT

name: Inner Goddess Herbal Tea Infusion Refill
description:
INNER GODDESS HERBAL TEA

Our Herbal Tea infusions are uniquely blended to provide effective and nurturing wellness drinks. Herbal teas are a superb way to nourish the body and nurture the soul. 
Herbal teas contain no caffeine, taste great and are super-easy to prepare and drink!  They contain pure medicinal properties and only therapeutically graded herbs are used. 
Your herbal tea may consist of one main herbal ingredient, or it may be a blend of herbal ingredients, each designed to bring about a specific purpose. These could be relaxation, rejuvenation or relief from a specific condition. 

This particular blend of tea has been beautifully designed by Kerry to balance the female hormone system and to enable us to embrace our inner wise woman. It will work with and enhance the feminine energy, endocrine system, along with the energy of the heart and sacral chakra. 

Ingredients:

	Red Clover - This contains oestrogen like compounds that are helpful in relieving menopausal symptoms. Red Clover also contains a high concentration of iron and copper salts which makes it an excellent blood tonic as well as effective blood cleanser.
	Wild Yam - This herb contains a specific group of phyto-oestrogens called steroidal saponins. These saponins share the same basic four ring structure as human steroidal hormones such as the female hormones, oestrogen and progesterone. Because of it’s particular chemistry, Wild Yam is perfect for the treatment of menopausal and menstrual problems. 
	Chaste Berry Tree - This is a fantastic herb for the treatment of PMT/PMS. It will help balance hormone production in the first and second half of the menstrual cycle. Chaste Berry (Vitex Agnus-castus) is a popular aromatic fruit of the Chaste Tree which is used to treat women’s issues. It has been shown to be very effective in restoring the menstrual cycle, relieving the symptoms of menopause, and helping with PMS.
	Black Cohosh - This is one of the best and biggest selling herbal treatments for hormonal issues. It contains phyto-oestrogenic chemicals that help alleviate many symptoms such as fatigue, irritability, lowered sex drive, hot flushes and vaginal dryness. 
	Sage - This will strengthen the nerves and can be used to combat cramps. Sage also has oestrogenic properties, making it useful in counteracting night sweats and hot flushes. It will also assist to relieve period pain and cramping. 

All of these herbs are recommended to assist with reducing some of the symptoms associated with menopause such as hot flushes, night sweats, dryness and headaches. It will also help with PMS and with rebalancing the female hormone system.

name: Calm Herbal Tea Infusion Refill
description:
Calm Herbal Tea


Calming the mind, body and soul, this soothing tea blend was lovingly created by Kerry to offer an overall calming action that helps relax and restore your entire body and spirit. 

This calming tea eases restlessness and assists to bring your whole body back into balance, so you can approach life exactly where it finds you.
Calm Herbal Tea is the ideal complement to a busy and overwhelming lifestyle as it helps in managing the day to day stressors we all live along side. As Calm Herbal Tea does not contain caffeine or sedatives, it can be enjoyed at any time of the day or night to bring about rebalance and relaxation. 

Ingredients:

	Chamomile - is one of the best known and loved herbs for anxiety and relaxation. Traditionally, it has been used as a natural remedy for stress and anxiety. More recently, studies suggest there may be a scientific basis for chamomile's reported effectiveness. Chamomile is great if anxiety is the cause of your sleeplessness. As a herbal tea, Chamomile will calm and relax the entire body. It has been used to treat sleeplessness and insomnia for hundreds of years. It is also good for panic attacks and anxiety issues. Chamomile is used to soothe away upset stomachs and can help ease headaches brought about by caffeine withdrawal. 
	Hibiscus - This is a garnet colored, lively and fruity infusion. Hibiscus flowers provide essential Vitamin C and mega antioxidants to help prevent tiredness and will revive a sluggish immune system. 
	Lavender - Lavender tea benefits have been known about for a long time as being particularly beneficial to disorders involving the nervous system. Lavender tea may help ease insomnia and calm nervousness and anxiety issues. It may also be helpful to alleviate stress and to uplift flagging spirits. 
	Passion Flower - Passion Flower aides in achieving restful sleep and in helping to combat nervous tension and anxiety. It is believed to act directly on the central nervous system and is recommended by many herbalists for sleeplessness due to overwork or stress. Passionflower is used to relieve muscle tension and is recommended for nervous disorders and insomnia.  

NOTE - DO NOT INGEST IF YOU ARE TAKING PARKINSON’S MEDICATION. PLEASE CHECK WITH YOUR DOCTOR IF YOU ARE ON NERVE MEDICATION. 

Our Herbal Tea infusions are uniquely blended to provide effective and nurturing wellness drinks. Herbal teas are a superb way to nourish the body and nurture the soul. 
Herbal teas contain no caffeine, taste great and are super-easy to prepare and drink!  They contain pure medicinal properties and only therapeutically graded herbs are used. 
Your herbal tea may consist of one main herbal ingredient, or it may be a blend of herbal ingredients, each designed to bring about a specific purpose. These could be relaxation, rejuvenation or relief from a specific condition.

name: Uplift Herbal Tea Infusion Refill
description:
UPLIFT HERBAL TEA


Uplift Herbal tea has been especially created by Kerry to have a beautiful taste as well as having fantastic herbal benefits. 

Do you need to uplift flagging spirits? Do you feel sapped, unmotivated and you seem to have lost your motivation? have you lost your focus? Then Uplift Tea is the perfect remedy for you!

If you don’t normally like the taste of herbal tea, then Uplift will definitely surprise you. From the stunning citrus aroma that whisps around the cup to the appealing citrus taste that will flow over your palate, this particular blend of tea is packed full of goodness. 

The kids will also love this as it’s a fantastic and healthy alternative to unhealthy cordials!

Awaken your senses with this invigorating and refreshing caffeine free blend of herbs, whilst gently helping to detoxify your body as well. 

Ingredients:

	Lemongrass - This has a positive effect on nervous conditions and provides a boost when spirits are low, it also tastes superb!
	Hibiscus - This is great for fatigue, sore throats, colds and flu as it’s jam packed full of Vitamin C.
	Turkish Apple pieces and Orange - These are FULL of vitamins.
	Lemon Myrtle - Lemon Myrtle is known for it’s uplifting and calming properties. 
	Dandelion Root - This is used to purify and detoxify your liver and gallbladder from toxins. It’s rich in Vitamin A, C, D and B-complex, and has very high levels of minerals. Dandelion Root also acts as a blood purifier and improves circulation.
	Lemon and Lime essence (natural flavour).


Our Herbal Tea infusions are uniquely blended to provide effective and nurturing wellness drinks. Herbal teas are a superb way to nourish the body and nurture the soul. 
Herbal teas contain no caffeine, taste great and are super-easy to prepare and drink!  They contain pure medicinal properties and only therapeutically graded herbs are used. 
Your herbal tea may consist of one main herbal ingredient, or it may be a blend of herbal ingredients, each designed to bring about a specific purpose. These could be relaxation, rejuvenation or relief from a specific condition.

name: Full Skincare Range Pack
description:
All of our products are made with love and infused with homeopathic and crystal essences to help balance the mind, body and soul as well as including luxurious natural ingredients to give amazing results to the skin

This amazing pack contains all of our natural skincare products, beautifully packaged for half price. A great way to try our products or to send as a gift.
Includes:
1 x Pumpkin  exfoliant with muslin cloth
1 x Cucumber & aloe vera cleanser with muslin cloth
1 x Red wine & glycolic toner
1 x Eventone daily moisturiser
1 x Red Wine Nourishing Moisturiser
1 x Turn Back Time eye cream
1 x Healing Garden Body Lotion

name: Uplift Essential Oil
description:
Essential oils are an amazing way to instantly change the ambience of your home or office.       

An amazing blend of essential oils to uplift and enliven the senses.
Contains: 
Lime - refreshing and uplifting. The crisp citrus tones will bring a smile to your face and joy to your heart.
Sweet orange -  lifts the spirits and eases the mind.
Lemon scented tea tree -  emotionally it is said to be useful for reducing anxiety, stress, depression and for easing nervous tension.

Directions:
Place  four drops of oil into the water in your oil burner/vaporizer                                                                                       
tohelp enliven the soul.

name: Calm Essential Oil
description:
Essential oils are an amazing way to instantly change the ambience of your home or office.
Calm is a beautiful blend of vanilla and sweet orange, speacially selected  to help you feel more calm and relaxed..
           
Orange oil is like the sun it brings happiness and warmth to the mind and helps people to relax. Orange oil is a great anti-depressant, carminative, sedative and tonic.Whilst vanilla oil can ease stress and bring a feeling of comfort.
Directions:
Place  four drops of oil into the water in your oil burner/vaporizer                                                                                       
to create a relaxing and calming experience

name: Healing Garden Body Lotion
description:
All of our products are made with love and infused with homeopathic and crystal essences to help balance the mind, body and soul as well as including luxurious natural ingredients to give amazing results to the skin

An amazing total body lotion that soothes and moisturisers the skin whilst releasing the healing qualities of specially selected herbs.
 Containing the renowned secret herbal recipe of Ron Jacques which helps reduce all aches and pains. Extracts of gingko biloba and olive leaf, blended with white, green and red teas stimulate circulation; offer a high level of anti-oxidant and anti-aging properties.
Enriched with vitamin E and vitamin B3 for skin repair.

Product Directions:
Use daily. Massage into skin or sore area as needed. To be used externally & not on broken skin. 

Product Ingredients:
*Certified organic ingredients
 Water, Aloe Juice, Vitus Vinifera (Grape seed) Oil*, Capric/Capryllic Triglicerides(Coconut Oil)*, cetearyl glucoside ( vegetable emulsifier) Prunus Dulcis (Almond) Oil*, HelianthusAnnuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Glyceryl Stearate, phenyl trimethicone,Phospholipids, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-6 (olive oil), Stearyl Alcohol, Vegetable Stearate,Glycerine, Butyrospermum Parkii* (Shea Butter), Glaucine, Niacinamide (VitaminB3), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Gingko Biloba Leaf Extract*, Olea Europaea (Olive)Leaf Extract*, Feverfew (Chrysanthemum parthenium), gotu kola (Centella asiatica) Arnica Montana valerian (Valeriana Officinalis ), Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos Red Tea) Leaf Extract*, CamelliaSinesis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract*,Allantoin (Comfrey Root)*, Lactic Acid, Sweet Orange* essential oil.. Infusion of homeopathic & crystal essences.

name: Pumpkin Face Polish & Natural Muslin Cloth
description:
All of our products are made with love and infused with homeopathic and crystal essences to help balance the mind, body and soul as well as including luxurious natural ingredients to give amazing results to the skin.

The power and benefits of two exfoliates in one. The first exfoliate removes the old layer of skin by a polishing action which removes imperfections and rough skin. Secondly the pumpkin and fruit enzyme action goes deeper removing even more dead cells which improves clarity and texture of all skin types and diminishes the appearance of fine lines. The new skin is then nourished and hydrated by the jojoba oil, hemp seed oil, Vit E, avocado oil, carrot oil and meadow form oil which leaves the skin feeling and looking softer and smoother.
Product Directions:
Apply to dry skin and gently massage in circular motions, avoiding eye area. Leave for 5-10 minutes, massage briefly again and rinse thoroughly with warm water or use the muslin cloth included, rinsed in warm water as this also works as an exfoliator. Use 1-2 times per week or as needed.

Product Ingredients:
* certified organic
 Cucurbita Pepo (pumpkin) Pulp*, Water, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Bromelain, Papain, Asafetida Extract, Yeast Extract* (plant pseudo collagen), Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed)Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil*,Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides (Coconut Oil*) Salix Nigra (willow) Bark Extract*, calendula officinalis (calendula) flower extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract*,Lavandula Angustifolia (lavender) Flower Extract*, Daucus Carota Sativa (carrot)Root Extract**, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E Acetate), Citrus Aurantium Dulcis(orange) Peel Oil* and Olibanum (frankincense) Oil*. Aluminum Silica (Bauxite), Glyceryl Mono Stearate*, ButyrospermumParkii* (Shea Butter), 
 Vegetable Glycerine*, Stearic Acid,(Vegan)*,  Cetyl Alcohol (Palm Oil)*.

name: Red Wine Nourishing Face Cream
description:
All of our products are made with love and infused with homeopathic and crystal essences to help balance the mind, body and soul as well as including luxurious natural ingredients to give amazing results to the skin.

 When applied to the skin our luxurious rejuvenating cream hydrates even the driest skin, smoothing the surface and reducing fine lines.  Full of vitamins and antioxidants from our organic red wine extract a great anti-aging  tonic for the skin.

Product Directions:
After cleansing and toning, apply a small amount to face and neck and massage in gently. Can be used day or night.

*Certified organic ingredients
 Aloe Vera Gel*, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butyrospermum Parkii* (SheaButter),Mangifera Indica (Mango Butter) Seed Oil*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, PrunusDulcis (Almond) Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Organic Red WineExtract*, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) SeedOil*, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*, Capric/Caprilic Triglycerides (Coconut Oil)*,Vegetable Glycerin, Stearic Acid (Vegan)*, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Camellia Sinensis(Japanese Green Tea) Leaf Extract*. description:
All of our products are made with love and infused with homeopathic and crystal essences to help balance the mind, body and soul as well as including luxurious natural ingredients to give amazing results to the skin.
Our selected botanicals help eliminate age spots and sun damage giving a more even skin tone also including 5 natural oils that enrich and protect the skin.
The cream is very similar to our own natural sebum thus making it easily absorbed and ideal to use daily under make-up.

After cleansing and toning, apply a small amount to face and neck and massage in gently.

 Aqua, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Water*, Sophora Angustifolia Root Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, Prunus Dulcis (Almond) Oil*, Persea Gratissima(Avocado) Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Vitis Vinifera (Grape)Seed Oil*, Capric/Caprilic Triglyceride Diacetyl Boldine, Butyrospermum Parkii*(Shea Butter), Mangifera Indica (Mango Butter) Seed Oil*, Vegetable Glycerin,Stearic Acid (Vegan)*, Glyceryl Stearate, Cucumis Sativis (Cucumber) Fruit Extract,Cetyl Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E),Cyclomethicone (Silica). name: Red Wine & Glycolic Antioxidant Toner
description:
All of our products are made with love and infused with homeopathic and crystal essences to help balance the mind, body and soul as well as including luxurious natural ingredients to give amazing results to the skin.
This beautiful toner will sweep away impurities while protecting your skin from damage with the antioxidants in red wine extract. The use of glycolic will improve oily and acne prone skin and decrease the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Product Directions:
After cleansing, apply toner with cotton pad to remove residue from cleanser, makeup or  water. Follow with appropriate moisturiser for your skin type. Keep out of your eyes.

Product Ingredients:
*Certified organic ingredients
Water, Organic Red Wine Extract*, Glycolic Acid*, Witch Hazel Distillate*, Oat Extract*, Hyaluronic Acid*, Extracts* of Nettle, Melissa, Elderflower, Cleavers, Plantain, Rose Distillate, Sunflower Seed Extract*, Zinc PCA (Amino Acid Derivative). Infusion of homeopathic & crystal essences.

name: Cucumber & Aloe Vera Cleanser with Muslin cloth
description:
All of our products are made with love and infused with homeopathic and crystal essences to help balance the mind, body and soul as well as including luxurious natural ingredients to give amazing results to the skin.
Cucumber and aloe vera work beautifully together for healing and cleansing and have an extremely soothing effect on the skin. They also contain amino acids and minerals that help firm and regenerate the skin whilst tightening the pores. 
Our gentle cleanser is perfect for sensitive skin.


Product Directions:
Apply a small amount to a damp cotton pad and wipe OR apply small amount of cleanser to dry skin, massage then rinse thoroughly with a warm damp muslin cloth (included).

Product Ingredients:
*Certified organic ingredients
 Aqua, cocunt oil ( Sodium Cocoamphoacetate)*, Decyl Glucoside (plant sources)*, Sucrose Cocoate (sugar base)*, Cocomide MIPA, Glyceryl MonoStearate*, Chamomile Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract* (Chamomile), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Cucumis Sativus* (Cucumber) Fruit Extract ,Camellia Sinensis (Japanese Green Tea) Leaf Extract*, cetearyl glucoside ( vegetable Emulsifier) Essential Oils* of Cedarwood, Rosewood, Sage, Myrrh, Palmarosa, Blue Cypress,Patchouli, Moroccan Rose, German Chamomile, precious Neroli. name: Let There Be Light Essence & Card
description:
The card you have chosen is the Let There Be Light .
By choosing this card, the universe is saying now is the time to seek a deeper understanding and connection to the universe. To have faith and detachment and realise there is a divine plan. 
Key words for you at this time are:
Self mastery, inspiration, divine purpose, detachment, faith.

BY CHOOSING THIS CARD & ESSENCE PERHAPS NOW IS THE TIME:
To have a spiritual connection
To seek a deeper understanding and connection to the universe
To watch without reacting to your life and the lives of others
To accept that what is happening is part of the divine journey and cosmic plan for your life
To realise that life is a journey and accept we are here to learn and everything happens for a reason 
To learn about ones spirituality
To consider / experience our connection to the concept of God or a higher intelligence
to realise there is light at the end of the tunnel
to realise All Will BE Well 

You are here to enable the divine purpose of the universe to unfold. That is how important you are!
Eckhart Tolle Quote


When choosing this card it can be a sign of spiritual growth or a time of sadness. Know all is well.

If you would like to start to begin a deeper connection with yourself and the universe plus more . You can purchase the Let There Be Light essence Pack – which is a unique combination of homeopathic and crystal essences that help you connect to you become still and connect more on your spiritual journey. With it you receive our beautiful card with a picture, meditation and journal activity to help you with the ability to be able to connect more to your spiritual journey as well as a booklet that gives you more in-depth knowledge and extra things you can do in your lives to help you on your journey eg activities, which foods to eat, exercises to do, colours to wear etc. illness we may attract /have when blocked in this area.

You will also receive our beautiful Blossom journal so you can record your journey and meditations.

description:

Communication, Soul Purpose, Truth, Wisdom, Choice

BY CHOOSING THIS CARD & ESSENCE PERHAPS NOW IS THE TIME:

To learn to listen and follow your souls purpose
To accept who you truly are
To be true to yourself

 To realise that life is a journey and accept we are here to learn and everything happens for a reason. 
To communicate our needs and requirements.

To Have no expectations and give up the need to know why things happen as they do. Trust that the unscheduled events in our lives are a form of spiritual direction.

David augsberger

If you would like to start to get in touch with your true self and souls purpose.   Joshua Loth Liebman quo

name: Uplift Soy Candle
description:
Using the wisdom of nature and the art of aromatherapy, we have created a range of therapeutic candles to help combat the stress and issues of modern day living.
A beautiful soy wax candle in a frosted glass container.
 An amazing fresh citrus smell to uplift and enliven the spirits.
An uplifting and positive mood enhancing blend containing : 
Lime - refreshing and uplifting and the crisp citrus tones will bring a smile to your face and joy to your heart.
sweet orange -  lifts the spirits and eases the mind.
lemon scented tea tree -  emotionally it is said to be useful for reducing anxiety, stress, depression and for easing nervous tension.
Burn time = 40 - 50 hours

 At Blossom Body & Soul we make all of our candles from all natural soy wax which is a renewable source, biodegradable and contains no pesticides or herbicides. Our wax is blended with exquisite natural essential oils and our wicks are 100% cotton and contain no lead. Soy wax candles are non toxic, burn cleaner and longer than paraffin wax candles.

Blossom uses the finest natural ingredients and premium natural essential oils.
All Blossom candles are meticulously hand-made and hand-poured locally in Australia.
The candle comes with an easy to remove label so you can enjoy the beautiful frosted glass container.perfect for any home decor.

name: Smudge Bowl
description:
Smudge Bowls are a great addition to your smudging ceremony, providing a safe way to carry,store and distinguish your smudge sticks.
Our white smudge bowls are hand-crafted, hand-thrown hand-painted earthenware.
The bowls are 15cm white in colour with black writing saying –
 Blossom - may you always flourish and prosper written around the inside edge. This is a lovely reminder to say an intention when you are cleansing a place or person.
All bowls may vary slightly as they are all hand made locally.
The design is an open bowl to contain sand for extinguishing your smudge bundle.
It is also an ideal way to store your smudging materials between uses.
To use just fill the bowl half full with sand.

name: Blossom Tea Set for Two
description:
Our beautiful signature Blossom tea for two set is authentically made in Japan from the finest quality.
A beautiful white square teapot with wooden handle and two cups with an orange blossom motif on the cups and teapot. 
 Teapot includes a fine mesh stainless steel infuser. 
Comes gift boxed in natural coloured card box with lid.
 
Teapot Dimensions:
680ml teapot
base of pot (not including handle and spout) 90mm X 70mm, height 120mm
Cup Dimensions: base 35mm diameter, top 75mm diameter, height 60mm.

name: Tong Herbal Tea Infuser
description:
DON’T HAVE A FANCY TEAPOT
Don’t worry this is a fantastic, easy and portable way to use herbal teas. Have one at home, the office or kep in your bag. Just place your herbal teas into the mesh and place in your cup then add hot water covering the herbs
Tongs Infuser -Mesh like filter. 4.5cm diameter with a metal handle. Bagged in a purple pouch

name: Cup Holder Tea Infuser
description:
DON’T HAVE A FANCY TEAPOT
Don’t worry this is a fantastic, easy and portable way to use herbal teas. Have one at home or the office.

This special design cup holder tea infuser features a special hook to hang on the side of your cup or mug. Just place your herbal tea into the mesh and place in your cup then add hot water covering the herbs.
Dimentions: 
65mm top diameter, 55mm deep, 105mm long including handle.

name: Uplift herbal Tea & Canister
description:
UPLIFT HERBAL TEA


Uplift Herbal tea has been especially created by Kerry to have a beautiful taste as well as having fantastic herbal benefits. 

Do you need to uplift flagging spirits? Do you feel sapped, unmotivated and you seem to have lost your motivation? Unfocused? Then Uplift Tea is the perfect remedy for you!

If you don’t normally like the taste of herbal tea, then Uplift will definitely surprise you. From the stunning citrus aroma that whisps around the cup to the appealing citrus taste that will flow over your palate, this particular blend of tea is packed full of goodness. 

The kids will also love this as it’s a fantastic and healthy alternative to unhealthy cordials!

Awaken your senses with this invigorating and refreshing caffeine free blend of herbs, whilst gently helping to detoxify your body as well. 

Ingredients:

	Lemongrass - This has a positive effect on nervous conditions and provides a boost when spirits are low, it also tastes superb!
	Hibiscus - This is great for fatigue, sore throats, colds and flu as it’s jam packed full of Vitamin C.
	Turkish Apple pieces and Orange - These are FULL of vitamins.
	Lemon Myrtle - Lemon Myrtle is known for it’s uplifting and calming properties. 
	Dandelion Root - This is used to purify and detoxify your liver and gallbladder from toxins. It’s rich in Vitamin A, C, D and B-complex, and has very high levels of minerals. Dandelion Root also acts as a blood purifier and improves circulation.
	Lemon and Lime essence (natural flavour).

The tea comes in a beautiful mat silver tea canister to store your tea and keep it fresh (refills are available)

Our Herbal Tea infusions are uniquely blended to provide effective and nurturing wellness drinks. Herbal teas are a superb way to nourish the body and nurture the soul. 
Herbal teas contain no caffeine, taste great and are super-easy to prepare and drink!  They contain pure medicinal properties and only therapeutically graded herbs are used. 
Your herbal tea may consist of one main herbal ingredient, or it may be a blend of herbal ingredients, each designed to bring about a specific purpose. These could be relaxation, rejuvenation or relief from a specific condition.

name: Calm Herbal Tea & Canister
description:
Calm Herbal Tea


Calming the mind, body and soul, this soothing tea blend was lovingly created by Kerry to offer an overall calming action that helps relax and restore your entire body and spirit. 

This calming tea eases restlessness and assists to bring your whole body back into balance, so you can approach life exactly where it finds you.
Calm Herbal Tea is the ideal complement to a busy and overwhelming lifestyle as it helps in managing the day to day stressors we all live along side. As Calm Herbal Tea does not contain caffeine or sedatives, it can be enjoyed at any time of the day or night to bring about rebalance and relaxation. 

Ingredients:

	Chamomile - is one of the best known and loved herbs for anxiety and relaxation. Traditionally, it has been used as a natural remedy for stress and anxiety. More recently, studies suggest there may be a scientific basis for chamomile's reported effectiveness. Chamomile is great if anxiety is the cause of your sleeplessness. As a herbal tea, Chamomile will calm and relax the entire body. It has been used to treat sleeplessness and insomnia for hundreds of years. It is also good for panic attacks and anxiety issues. Chamomile is used to soothe away upset stomachs and can help ease headaches brought about by caffeine withdrawal. 
	Hibiscus - This is a garnet colored, lively and fruity infusion. Hibiscus flowers provide essential Vitamin C and mega antioxidants to help prevent tiredness and will revive a sluggish immune system. 
	Lavender - Lavender tea benefits have been known about for a long time as being particularly beneficial to disorders involving the nervous system. Lavender tea may help ease insomnia and calm nervousness and anxiety issues. It may also be helpful to alleviate stress and to uplift flagging spirits. 
	Passion Flower - Passion Flower aides in achieving restful sleep and in helping to combat nervous tension and anxiety. It is believed to act directly on the central nervous system and is recommended by many herbalists for sleeplessness due to overwork or stress. Passionflower is used to relieve muscle tension and is recommended for nervous disorders and insomnia.  

NOTE - DO NOT INGEST IF YOU ARE TAKING PARKINSON’S MEDICATION. PLEASE CHECK WITH YOUR DOCTOR IF YOU ARE ON NERVE MEDICATION. 

Our Herbal Tea infusions are uniquely blended to provide effective and nurturing wellness drinks. Herbal teas are a superb way to nourish the body and nurture the soul. 
Herbal teas contain no caffeine, taste great and are super-easy to prepare and drink!  They contain pure medicinal properties and only therapeutically graded herbs are used. 
Your herbal tea may consist of one main herbal ingredient, or it may be a blend of herbal ingredients, each designed to bring about a specific purpose. These could be relaxation, rejuvenation or relief from a specific condition. 



The tea comes in a beautiful mat silver tea canister to store your tea and keep it fresh (refills are available)

name: Inner Goddess Herbal Tea & Canister
description:
INNER GODDESS HERBAL TEA

Our Herbal Tea infusions are uniquely blended to provide effective and nurturing wellness drinks. Herbal teas are a superb way to nourish the body and nurture the soul. 
Herbal teas contain no caffeine, taste great and are super-easy to prepare and drink!  They contain pure medicinal properties and only therapeutically graded herbs are used. 
Your herbal tea may consist of one main herbal ingredient, or it may be a blend of herbal ingredients, each designed to bring about a specific purpose. These could be relaxation, rejuvenation or relief from a specific condition. 

This particular blend of tea has been beautifully designed by Kerry to balance the female hormone system and to enable us to embrace our inner wise woman. It will work with and enhance the feminine energy, endocrine system, along with the energy of the heart and sacral chakra. 

Ingredients:

	Red Clover - This contains oestrogen like compounds that are helpful in relieving menopausal symptoms. Red Clover also contains a high concentration of iron and copper salts which makes it an excellent blood tonic as well as effective blood cleanser.
	Wild Yam - This herb contains a specific group of phyto-oestrogens called steroidal saponins. These saponins share the same basic four ring structure as human steroidal hormones such as the female hormones, oestrogen and progesterone. Because of it’s particular chemistry, Wild Yam is perfect for the treatment of menopausal and menstrual problems. 
	Chaste Berry Tree - This is a fantastic herb for the treatment of PMT/PMS. It will help balance hormone production in the first and second half of the menstrual cycle. Chaste Berry (Vitex Agnus-castus) is a popular aromatic fruit of the Chaste Tree which is used to treat women’s issues. It has been shown to be very effective in restoring the menstrual cycle, relieving the symptoms of menopause, and helping with PMS.
	Black Cohosh - This is one of the best and biggest selling herbal treatments for hormonal issues. It contains phyto-oestrogenic chemicals that help alleviate many symptoms such as fatigue, irritability, lowered sex drive, hot flushes and vaginal dryness. 
	Sage - This will strengthen the nerves and can be used to combat cramps. Sage also has oestrogenic properties, making it useful in counteracting night sweats and hot flushes. It will also assist to relieve period pain and cramping. 

All of these herbs are recommended to assist with reducing some of the symptoms associated with menopause such as hot flushes, night sweats, dryness and headaches. It will also help with PMS and with rebalancing the female hormone system.

The tea comes in a beautiful mat silver tea canister to store your tea and keep it fresh (refills are available)

name: Energy Herbal Tea & Canister
description:
ENERGY HERBAL TEA

THE RED BULL OF HERBAL TEA
This particular Energy Herbal Tea has been designed by Kerry especially for those of us whose batteries are running on the lower side! Recharge naturally with this supercharged ginseng tonic which has energising herbs known to help improve energy levels, concentration and overall mental function.  This tea has a great tangy taste and will also act as a supportive adrenal stimulant which has been proven to assist with the management of stress.  This beautiful blend has been designed to draw on Mother Nature’s wisdom of the ages. 

Ginseng is known as the ‘Root of Life’ and has been used for around 7000 years!
It is best known as a vitality and stamina boosting herb and is a stimulating tonic. Ginseng has a positive effect on the central nervous, cardiovascular and endocrine systems, and also promotes immune function and serves to boost metabolism. 

Ingredients:

	Panax Ginseng - A Qi tonic that is brilliant at counteracting stress and improving physical energy and strength.
	Siberian Ginseng - This reduces the adrenaline and cortical rush caused by stressful events and returns them to baseline more quickly, thus reducing the effects on blood pressure, nerves etc. It basically assists the body to adapt to stress. Siberian Ginseng is also noted for its ability to aid mental function and concentration.
	Rosehip - Rosehip is a natural source of Vitamin C and bioflavonoid. It is a liver, kidney and blood tonic, and a fantastic remedy for fatigue and colds etc. It is of garnet colour and a lively and fruity infusion to the tea. Our combination of rosehips and hibiscus provides essential Vitamin C and antioxidants to help prevent tiredness and to relieve a sluggish and overworked immune system.
	Liquorice - is a perfect partner with ginsengs as in Chinese medicine, it is also classified as a Qi tonic. This means it is used to restore our basic energy levels and help us adapt to the stressors life places on us. Liquorice is also a strong adrenal support. 
	Hibiscus - This is great for fighting fatigue and those sore throats, colds and flu bugs as it’s super rich in Vitamin C. 

The herbs that have been used are especially designed to counteract stress and how it affects our mental and physical energy. 

NOTE - WE RECOMMEND AGAINST THE CONSUMPTION OF GINSENG IF YOU HAVE ANY HEART OR KIDNEY CONDITION OR IF YOU ARE PREGNANT

The tea comes in a beautiful mat silver tea canister to store your tea and keep it fresh (refills are available)

name: White Sage Smudge Stick
description:
Is your home or work place feeling stressful, depressing or sad ?Smudging is an easy way to clear that negative energy and replace it with a feeling of joy, love and abundance.
Smudge sticks are used for purifying and cleansing, using sacred herbs. The sacred ritual of purifying with smoke comes from native people in both North and South America.
Smudging is a perfect way to cleanse a person, purify the body, home, office, healing room etc.
Our unique smudge sticks also have protection crystals attached to them , enhancing their cleansing, purify and protective qualities.


Our unique Smudge Sticks smell amazing, they are made from organic, wildcrafted white sage. Bound by organic hemp twine contained in a biodegradable vegetable based plastic bag that you can compost.

name: Journal
description:
This beautiful journal is a great way to save your thoughts and experience from your meditations.
The cover has our unique blossom design fabric sewn onto the cover with the inspiring words "may you always flourish and prosper" below.

JOURNALING
Journaling is a wonderful way to gain greater self awareness. It trains us to pay attention to our own experiences by really sitting with our body's senses and our heart's feelings and by really listening to our minds thoughts and our innate intuitions. Writing a journal is both rational and creative, and there is no wrong way to do it.

We often have all the answers we need deep within us, but the internal chatter and external busyness in our lives makes it hard to access our internal guidance. Keeping a journal can help us hear and listen to that quiet voice within. 


Size :4.75"x6.75"
Cover: 80lb matte finish cover stock with custom blossom design fabric sewn on and text "may you always flourish and prosper" 
Inside: 80 white plain pages of 100% recycled white text weight paper
Binding: Saddle stitched (staples) in two spots

name: Calm Soy Candle
description:
Using the wisdom of nature and the art of aromatherapy, we have created a range of therapeutic candles to help combat the stress and issues of modern day living.A beautiful soy wax candle in a frosted glass container.
Calm is a beautiful blend of vanilla and sweet orange, speacially selected  to help you feel more calm and relaxed..
           
Orange oil is like the sun it brings happiness and warmth to the mind and helps people to relax. Orange oil is a great anti-depressant, carminative, sedative and tonic.Whilst vanilla oil can ease stress and bring a feeling of comfort.
                                                               
Contains : 
Vanilla Essential Oil, is an effective anti depressant and mood up-lifter. This oil has a relaxing and calming effect on the brain and the nerves and gives relief from anxiety, anger, restlessness etc.

sweet orange -  lifts the spirits, eases the mind and works as an anti-depressant.

Burn time = 40 - 50 hours

 At Blossom Body & Soul we make all of our candles from all natural soy wax which is a renewable source, biodegradable and contains no pesticides or herbicides. Our wax is blended with exquisite natural essential oils and our wicks are 100% cotton and contain no lead. Soy wax candles are non toxic, burn cleaner and longer than paraffin wax candles.

Blossom uses the finest natural ingredients and premium natural essential oils.
All Blossom candles are meticulously hand-made and hand-poured locally in Australia.
The candle comes with an easy to remove label so you can enjoy the beautiful frosted glass container.perfect for any home decor.

name: Turn Back Time Intensive Eye Treatment
description:
All of our products are made with love and infused with homeopathic and crystal essences to help balance the mind, body and soul as well as including luxurious natural ingredients to give amazing results to the skin
The exceptional line smoothing comes from a phytosteroid complex of Wild Yam and Soya that gives firming and wrinkle reduction.
 
Product Directions:
Pat gently under eye area with ring finger from outer to inner corner of eye.
 
Product Ingredients:
*Certified organic ingredients
 Aqua, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter*, Butyrospermum Parkii*(Shea Butter), Emulsifying Wax NF, Stearic Acid (Vegan)*, Caprylic/CapricTriglycerides (Coconut Oil*), Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Oil*, Glyceryl Mono Stearate, Camellia Sinensis (Japanese Green Tea) Leaf Extract*, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C),Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Dioscorea Villosa (Wild Yam) Root Extract*, Glycine Soja(Soybean) Sterols*, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-3, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) FruitExtract*, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract*, Bladderwrack* (seaweed),Saccharomyces / Sea Salt Ferment, Guarana (Paullinia)*, Allantoin (Comfrey Root)*. Infusion of homeopathic & crystal essences.
